raw_text: Dagan et al (1993) argue that using a relatively small number of classes to model the similarity between words may lead to substantial loss of information

raw_text: As to the research on computing word sense relatedness, Dagan et al (1993) did some pilot work and Lee (1997) and Resnik (1999) contributed to the research on semantic similarity

raw_text: In (Dagan et al., 1993) and (Pereira et al,! 993), clusters of similar words are evaluated by how well they are able to recover data items that are removed from the input corpus one at a time
